long_description: Your new best friend on snow days, the women's Isis Carlotta 4-way-stretch soft-shell pants feature cuff gaiters and water resistance so you stay dry and comfy longer outdoors. Stretchy, breathable soft-shell fabric has a durable water repellent finish so moisture beads up and rolls off. Jeans styling has a fixed waistband with elastic at the back for an adjustable, comfortable fit. Internal gaiters with gripper elastic keep out powder and slush. Articulated knees allow comfortable range of motion with no tugging. Isis Carlotta Pants have a double pocket design, with slide-in and zippered hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Your new best friend on snow days, the women's Isis Carlotta 4-way-stretch soft-shell pants feature cuff gaiters and water resistance so you stay dry and comfy longer outdoors.
